name: Avagmah Online School
overview:
Since 2008, AVAGMAH has been instrumental in providing quality online education to thousands of professionals; delivering University accredited Continuing Education Programs.

AVAGMAH in partnership with some of the renowned universities across the globe like Jack Welch Management Institute, Strayer University, IMT Ghaziabad (Center of Distance Learning). Bharathidasan University & IGNOU has crafted courses exclusively for working professionals in India. These courses are 100% Industry relevant, and provide the right knowledge for a professional to excel in his career.

Virtual Classroom sessions through internet, Continuous & rigorous evaluation methodology, ISO 9001:2000 certified Learning Management System, Industry oriented curriculum, and dedicated learner support team ensure that all our learners get world class education while continuing their jobs. Today, we have 6,000+ learners mostly in the age bracket of 25-40 years and working for Indian & Global MNCs
